body.p: The Divvun project provides hyphenation for the following host applications:
The integration with MS Office and Adobe InDesign CS3 is done by Polderland, as it is for the spellers as well.
Adobe InDesign CS5.5 supports the same spellers and hyphenators as OpenOffice or LibreOffice, which means Hunspell as the speller engine, and the Tex-based hyphenation pattern lists for hyphenation.
We are presently working on adding hyphenation for InDesign CS5.5 and OpenOffice, the target release date is April 1.
